public final class Planner
extends java.lang.Object

Keeps the set of products and the PlanGrapher up-to-date.

Constructor Detail

Planner

public Planner(FileVersioner files,
               com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<java.lang.String,?> commonJsEnv,
               ToolProvider toolbox,
               java.lang.Iterable<java.nio.file.Path> planFiles,
               Logs logs,
               ArtifactListener<Product> listener,
               java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService execer)
Parameters:
files - versions plan files.
commonJsEnv - symbols available to plan file and tool file JavaScript.
toolbox - defines the tools available to plan files.
logs - receive messages about product definitions.
listener - receives updates as products are defined or destroyed.
execer - an executor which is used to schedule periodic maintenance tasks and which is used to update product definitions.
Method Detail

close

public void close()
Tears down non-local state.

Specified by:
close in interface java.io.Closeable

getProducts

public java.util.Map<BoundName,Product> getProducts()
Gets a map of names to products. This makes a best-effort to ensure that products are up-to-date. The output will not include any products that are masked -- that are named in two or more plan files that run to completion.

getPlanGraph

public PlanGraph getPlanGraph()
A snapshot of the product graph. This does not wait for products to be brought up-to-date.
